parameters.name: GrantType
parameters.description:
The VBRs for which you want to revoke permissions on the VPC. Valid values:

*   **ALL**: Permissions on the VPC are revoked for all VBRs in the specified region. **VbrInstanceIds** can be left empty.
*   **Specify**: Permissions on the VPC are revoked for the specified VBRs. **VbrInstanceIds** must be assigned a value.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the VPC is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: VbrInstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the VBRs for which you want to revoke the permissions.

parameters.name: VbrOwnerUid
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the VBR belongs.

parameters.name: VbrRegionNo
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the VBR is deployed.
